title: Vase And Pedestal, ca. 1785
medium: Porcelain with overglaze polychrome and gilt decoration
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Bottom of bowl on outside decorated with loops and acanthus leaves in relief. Upper portion decorated by friezes of triglyph-like rectangles, repeating loops of acanthus and one taper of mercarous on drapery.  Rich torus moulding at top and at top of cavetto pedestal, which rests on square base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase And Pedestal, ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Porcelain with overglaze polychrome and gilt decoration. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1923-22-50-a,b.
